news.title: Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg Stoked Washington’s Fears About TikTok
news.description: Zuckerberg reportedly urged the White House to view the advent of Chinese internet companies as detrimental to US business, and discussed TikTok with multiple senators.

news.title: Instagram is Adding Suggested Posts to the Main Feed
news.description: Once you reach the “You’re All Caught Up” screen in your Instagram feed, you may begin seeing “Suggested Posts” from accounts you don’t follow based on content you interact with.

news.title: Facebook Begins Merging Instagram and Messenger Chats in New Update
news.description: As part of a broader plan to unify all of its messaging platforms, Facebook has started the process of allowing users to merge their chats in Instagram and Facebook Messenger.

news.title: Twitter Facing FTC Investigation and Possible $250 Million Fine
news.description: In a recent regulatory filing, Twitter disclosed that it is under federal scrutiny for allegedly targeting users with ads based on information they provided for account security purposes.
